dataSet.name: DataSet1

totalField.expression: CASE WHEN (Sum(AmountRCOpeningSplittedBalanceDr) - Sum(AmountRCOpeningSplittedBalanceCr)) > 0 THEN (Sum(AmountRCOpeningSplittedBalanceDr) - Sum(AmountRCOpeningSplittedBalanceCr)) ELSE 0 END
CASE WHEN (Sum(AmountRCOpeningSplittedBalanceDr) - Sum(AmountRCOpeningSplittedBalanceCr)) < 0 THEN -(Sum(AmountRCOpeningSplittedBalanceDr) - Sum(AmountRCOpeningSplittedBalanceCr)) ELSE 0 END
CASE WHEN (Sum(AmountRCClosingSplittedBalanceDr) - Sum(AmountRCClosingSplittedBalanceCr)) > 0 THEN (Sum(AmountRCClosingSplittedBalanceDr) - Sum(AmountRCClosingSplittedBalanceCr)) ELSE 0 END
CASE WHEN (Sum(AmountRCClosingSplittedBalanceDr) - Sum(AmountRCClosingSplittedBalanceCr)) < 0 THEN -(Sum(AmountRCClosingSplittedBalanceDr) - Sum(AmountRCClosingSplittedBalanceCr)) ELSE 0 END

parameter.name: BeginOfFiscalYear
parameter.expression: CASE WHEN MONTH(&Period.StartDate) >= Constants.FirstMonthOfFiscalYear.Get() THEN DATEADD(DATEADD(DATETIME(1, 1, 1), "MONTH", Constants.FirstMonthOfFiscalYear.Get() - 1), "YEAR", YEAR(&Period.StartDate) - 1) ELSE DATEADD(DATEADD(DATETIME(1, 1, 1), "MONTH", Constants.FirstMonthOfFiscalYear.Get() - 1), "YEAR", YEAR(&Period.StartDate) - 2) END

parameter.dcsat:name: CurrentDate
parameter.dcsat:expression: Format(CurrentDate(), "DF='dddd, MMM d, yyyy h:mm:ss tt'")

parameter.dcsat:name: Indent
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 1 THEN "" WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 2 THEN " " WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 3 THEN " " ELSE " " END

parameter.dcsat:name: Indent
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 1 THEN "" WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 2 THEN " " WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 3 THEN " " ELSE " " END

parameter.dcsat:name: CurrentDate
parameter.dcsat:expression: Format(CurrentDate(), "DF='dddd, MMM d, yyyy h:mm:ss tt'")
